title: When you are Shaco, and the enemy is fighting your clone while you sit in a bush.

replies.body: Shaco mains, Whos with me?
yep all four of you.....

But doesn't that mean there are only, truly two of them?

better stuff him in a shaco box
What if shaco boxes are just his victims trying to get out to seek help
is that why they are so scary?
How would you feel if someone heavily mutilated pops out of a tiny box that you didn't know were there?
its actually just one. a clone, and two boxes

One box, two clones. 


I don't like where this is going.

Shaco built devour.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=IP7mUVOw,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-16T17:28:54.832+0000)
>
> http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.reactiongifs.us%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2013%2F06%2Fpopcorn_the_joker.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

As {{champion:238}}  I'm never ulting {{champion:35}} again. Not because ult, but because Q.

I went as AP {{champion:35}}  mid vs a {{champion:238}}  once. He literally never killed me with his ult.  Either I timed my ult to dodge his ult mark or I would just Q off to the side and he couldn't do any damage whatsoever.  Pretty funny to see a zed so visibly frustrated.

> [{quoted}](name=Paean,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=IP7mUVOw,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-09-17T19:19:04.109+0000)
>
> I went as AP {{champion:35}}  mid vs a {{champion:238}}  once. He literally never killed me with his ult.  Either I timed my ult to dodge his ult mark or I would just Q off to the side and he couldn't do any damage whatsoever.  Pretty funny to see a zed so visibly frustrated.

Done this before too. He legit chased me into a bush once, I ulted and Q'd out, he ults my clone and dunks it... And then implodes from Luden's Proc and it's damage. (Srs Luden's turns that thing into 700+ damage nuke at rank 1)
Gets even better when your clone 1v1s and wins
It gets even better when they kill it, causing a teammate to die.
http://media.giphy.com/media/LFlT04CTtrwc/giphy.gif
agreed , when they kill it and it kills other ppl or when they blow a ult on it and then realize what they have done
AP Shaco is delicious right now in the jungle.

Jokes on You! i keep 2 max {{item:2043}}'s with me 24/7 just for you bud..just for you.(and every other champ that thinks they can get away with stealth on).

{{champion:17}}  *Harrassing from bush*
{{champion:236}} *Still not aware that they nerfed Teemo's stealth so he goes to face check...and gets punished for it*
{{champion:117}} *Plops a pink in der*
{{champion:17}}*Sits there and face tanks damage from me not realizing that i pinked the bush already...and dies*

Or 

{{champion:236}} {{champion:117}} *Chasing*
{{champion:17}}{{champion:15}} *Running away*
{{champion:17}} *walks into a bush and camps*
{{champion:117}} {{item:2043}} 
{{champion:17}} *Gets Deleted again*

I'm Really surprised at the amount of times i have caught Teemo's(and Shaco/Akali/Talon/Vayne etc) trying to run and hide in bushes(Or out in the open) without knowing if the opponent can toss vision in their hiding spots..i guess A LOT of people don't like using their common sense and keeping pinks in their inventory when they KNOW these champs can use stealth.....
lol
And then your clone manages to kill them .-.
That moment when you get ganked by 7 shacos (4 tricksters and a yorick)
